# Kanecode Search Engine

## A simple search engine for your website
A simple search engine for your website. This Javascript library allows you to implement a complete search engine to your website. It is very easy to use and the code is very simple and reduced.

![Kanecode Search Engine](data:image/png;base64,)

This library opens the door to implement AJAX responses and dynamic results in your application. It is a very powerful tool that can be used to create a dynamic web applications.

## Installation

To use this library you can use the following code to implement it in your `HTML` file.

Includes the following lines to `head` section:
```html
<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/KaneCodeLabs/kanecode-searchengine@2.2.2/dist/searchengine.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/KaneCodeLabs/kanecode-searchengine@2.2.2/dist/searchengine.min.js"></script>
```

Includes the following lines to `body` section:
```html
<script>
	new KCSearchEngine(document.querySelector('.search-bar'), {
		data: ['Apple', 'Orange', 'Strawberry']
	});
</script>
```
